meanings.definition: Extremely impressive or daunting; inspiring great admiration, apprehension, or fear.
meanings.sent1: The thunderstorm was awesome, making everyone feel amazed and a little scared.
meanings.sent2: The view from the mountaintop was awesome, with breathtaking scenery all around.
meanings.sent3: The cat's awesome attempt at climbing the curtains left everyone in awe and laughter.
meanings.sent4: The awesome power of nature's fury could be felt in every crashing wave.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's awesome strength saved the city from disaster.

meanings.sent1: The cake was awesome, everyone loved its delicious taste.
meanings.sent2: The concert was awesome, with the band playing all the favorite songs.
meanings.sent3: The awesome dance moves of the penguin entertained the zoo visitors.
meanings.sent4: The awesome teamwork of the firefighters saved the building from destruction.
meanings.sent5: The awesome performance of the actor received a standing ovation.
